meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: Her corpulence made it difficult for her to move around comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his corpulence.
meanings.sent3: Despite his corpulence, he always had a cheerful demeanor.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the corpulence of the holiday feast.
meanings.sent5: The image of his corpulence stuck in my mind long after our meeting.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: The circus featured a humorous act with a corpulence as the main character.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with her corpulence but found support in her friends.
meanings.sent3: The corpulence at the party was the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: His corpulence was like a mountain in the room, impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The corpulence of the bear in the story was both intimidating and endearing.
